pages.text: Boola; “khusuubile Nyasaye nende akeshilibwa khu Ibraheem nende ka Musa yahelesibwa nende Isah nende Abarumwa okhurula khu Nyasaye wabu shikhukabukhasinjiakhwo hakari wabu tawe, nafu khwilekhulile khuye.”
Ne ukhaaba idini ilali yobwisilamu shalichamilwa tawe, neye mwikulu aliba mubandu basikha

Nyasaye anyala okhulunjisia arie Abandu bakhaya nibamalile okhusuubila khwabu, ne mana nibaba abaloli mbu Omurumwa uno niwobwatoto, mana ebifune bia habulafu nibiboolela, Ne Nyasaye shalunjisinjia Abandu abamabii tawe
Abo omurungo kwabu ni mbu bali nende eshilaamo shia Nyasaye nende shia Bamalaika nende eshia Abandu boosi
Balimenyamwo tsinyanga tsiosi shibalitutuyilibwa	eshinyasio	tawe neshibalihebwa obwiyangu tawe
Halali balia basaba eshileshelo khwako, mana nibaba abalayi Toto Nyasaye Niwobulesheli Owetsimbabaasi
Toto balia bakhaya nibamalile okhusuubila, mana nibameta okhukhaya, shibalileshelwa tawe ne abo nibo Abandu abakora
Toto balia bakhaya mana nibafwa nibali abakhayi shibalichamilwa tawe kata nibarusia idhahabu eshialo eshilaamba okhubanunula. Abo balinyoola eshinyasio eshilulu ne shibaliba nende ubahabina tawe
